 *
 * Used by both JobList and CompanyDetail to list jobs. Receives an apply
 * func prop which will be called by JobCard on apply.
 *
 * JobList -> JobCardList -> JobCard

 *
 */function JobCardList(_ref){var jobs=_ref.jobs,apply=_ref.apply;console.debug("JobCardList","jobs=",jobs);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"JobCardList"},jobs.map(function(job){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(JobCard,{key:job.id,id:job.id,title:job.title,salary:job.salary,equity:job.equity,companyName:job.companyName});}));}export default JobCardList;
